list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor BasicBoard and update RunManager
Refactored BasicBoard.java for code simplicity and readability. This includes streamlining the event filter and refining the use of optionals. The refactoring also ensures the fontSize value is explicitly cast to double. The RunManager configuration in workspace.xml has also been altered for optimal execution order.

task.summary:
Remove unnecessary files and code
Deleted unused / redundant files and unnecessary code lines to enhance readability and performance of the system. Changes made include removing PostgreSQL JDBC driver load from Main file, deleting files related to maven-compiler-plugin, and cleaning up white space in MainMenu file.

Remove unnecessary files and code
Deleted unused / redundant files and unnecessary code lines to enhance readability and performance of the system. Changes made include removing PostgreSQL JDBC driver load from Main file, deleting files related to maven-compiler-plugin, and cleaning up white space in MainMenu file.

Update path to Sudoku menu background image
The path to the Sudoku menu background image was modified. This change was made in the MainMenu.java file to reflect an updated directory structure and ensure that the background image is properly displayed.

Update path to Sudoku menu background image
The path to the Sudoku menu background image was modified. This change was made in the MainMenu.java file to reflect an updated directory structure and ensure that the background image is properly displayed.

Update image paths in view files
The image paths in several view classes (CampaignMenu, MainMenu, GameSettingsMenu) have been updated to reflect their new location in the /images directory. These changes pertain to assets such as lockImage, backgroundImage, and several game setting related images.

Update Maven dependencies and improve test coverage
Updated the version of Postgresql Maven dependency and added Junit Jupitar for improving test coverage. Added a test script for BasicBoard. Introduced Jacoco plugin for coverage reporting. Reordered classes in createdFiles.lst and revised comment placement in Main.java.

Remove applyNumberMode and draftMode functions
The code related to the applyNumberMode and draftMode has been commented out from the SudokuBoard.java file. This includes the functions that set their style, their hover events, and their click events, as well as their inclusion in the bottom box of the Sudoku board UI.

Update visibility and closing functionality for SudokuBoard
Several variables in SudokuBoard.java were updated from protected to public for easier accessibility. In addition, created a function in BasicBoard.java to close the current sudoku board and reset associated variables correctly.

Initialize BorderPane in the start method
The BorderPane in the SudokuBoard class was previously initialized when it was declared. This commit moves the initialization to the start method instead. This change contributes to ensuring the BorderPane is correctly set up when the application starts.

Update custom difficulty setting in BasicBoard
The custom difficulty in BasicBoard.java has been updated to print the square root of the gridSize instead of the gridSize itself. This is a bug-fix since the previous setting was incorrectly displaying the grid size for a custom difficulty level.

Update game descriptions and rules
The game descriptions for medium and hard levels have been simplified in GameSettingsMenu, removing the statement about the number of cells removed. A TextArea displaying the game rules has also been added to GameRulesMenu, enriching the user's understanding of how to play and interact with the game.

Update game rules and leaderboard
GameRulesMenu now includes a disclaimer about the game's workings. In LeaderBoard, unnecessary gridPane clear was removed and console messages for sorting by difficulty were added. The changes should help with guiding the user and understanding leaderboard actions.

Update Sudoku board handling and test run time
Code updates modified Sudoku board handling for key press events, button clicks, and the board display process. Additionally, the changes resulted in a slight decrease in test run time. This update improves the game interaction and maintains code efficiency.

Refactor BasicBoard and update RunManager
Refactored BasicBoard.java for code simplicity and readability. This includes streamlining the event filter and refining the use of optionals. The refactoring also ensures the fontSize value is explicitly cast to double. The RunManager configuration in workspace.xml has also been altered for optimal execution order.

Remove unnecessary files and code
Deleted unused / redundant files and unnecessary code lines to enhance readability and performance of the system. Changes made include removing PostgreSQL JDBC driver load from Main file, deleting files related to maven-compiler-plugin, and cleaning up white space in MainMenu file.

Update path to Sudoku menu background image
The path to the Sudoku menu background image was modified. This change was made in the MainMenu.java file to reflect an updated directory structure and ensure that the background image is properly displayed.

Update image paths in view files
The image paths in several view classes (CampaignMenu, MainMenu, GameSettingsMenu) have been updated to reflect their new location in the /images directory. These changes pertain to assets such as lockImage, backgroundImage, and several game setting related images.

Update Maven dependencies and improve test coverage
Updated the version of Postgresql Maven dependency and added Junit Jupitar for improving test coverage. Added a test script for BasicBoard. Introduced Jacoco plugin for coverage reporting. Reordered classes in createdFiles.lst and revised comment placement in Main.java.

Remove applyNumberMode and draftMode functions
The code related to the applyNumberMode and draftMode has been commented out from the SudokuBoard.java file. This includes the functions that set their style, their hover events, and their click events, as well as their inclusion in the bottom box of the Sudoku board UI.

Update visibility and closing functionality for SudokuBoard
Several variables in SudokuBoard.java were updated from protected to public for easier accessibility. In addition, created a function in BasicBoard.java to close the current sudoku board and reset associated variables correctly.

Initialize BorderPane in the start method
The BorderPane in the SudokuBoard class was previously initialized when it was declared. This commit moves the initialization to the start method instead. This change contributes to ensuring the BorderPane is correctly set up when the application starts.

Update custom difficulty setting in BasicBoard
The custom difficulty in BasicBoard.java has been updated to print the square root of the gridSize instead of the gridSize itself. This is a bug-fix since the previous setting was incorrectly displaying the grid size for a custom difficulty level.

Update game descriptions and rules
The game descriptions for medium and hard levels have been simplified in GameSettingsMenu, removing the statement about the number of cells removed. A TextArea displaying the game rules has also been added to GameRulesMenu, enriching the user's understanding of how to play and interact with the game.

Update game rules and leaderboard
GameRulesMenu now includes a disclaimer about the game's workings. In LeaderBoard, unnecessary gridPane clear was removed and console messages for sorting by difficulty were added. The changes should help with guiding the user and understanding leaderboard actions.

Update Sudoku board handling and test run time
Code updates modified Sudoku board handling for key press events, button clicks, and the board display process. Additionally, the changes resulted in a slight decrease in test run time. This update improves the game interaction and maintains code efficiency.

Refactor BasicBoard and update RunManager
Refactored BasicBoard.java for code simplicity and readability. This includes streamlining the event filter and refining the use of optionals. The refactoring also ensures the fontSize value is explicitly cast to double. The RunManager configuration in workspace.xml has also been altered for optimal execution order.
